text:
Hi , I am learning hubpost and currently trying to add Custom HubL to template but I am not able to find this module in Market Place

so anyone knows ,how can I add Custom HubL to my template file. I am able to download Custom HTML module from marketplace
can I use that module for custom HubL
I tried but it is not working
Hi <@UJWH1GTNH> The best way to do this is to create your own module.  You can add whatever custom HTML/HUBL you would like along with any styling and javascript you may require.
Let me know if I can help you out at all.  Most people in this Slack group are American, and they have a holiday today, so it will just be us non-american devs on here today.
OK. Sure. Thank you so much
